name: Tech Visionaries
description: Words of wisdom from the pioneers who shaped our digital world.
author: Quips Editorial

quotes.source: The Whole Earth Catalog, 1974 (popularized by Steve Jobs)

quotes.content: The best way to predict the future is to invent it.
Move fast and break things. Unless you are breaking stuff, you are not moving fast enough.
Your most unhappy customers are your greatest source of learning.
The people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world are the ones who do.
Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic.
The computer was born to solve problems that did not exist before.
When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.
